captions.text:
From Martin Scorsese, the legendary director
of that movie starring Leonardo DiCaprio,
that other movie starring Leonardo DiCaprio,
and also these movies starring Leonardo DiCaprio

Comes the Wolf of Wall Street
...starring Leonardo DiCaprio.

Strap in for the last film you’d ever want
to watch with your grandparents...

Featuring an average of 3.16 “f*cks” per
minute
But f*ck it: we can do better than that!

Leonardo Di-f*cking-Caprio stars as a f*cking
hot young rich guy who

hangs out on f*cking yachts and has sex with
f*cking models
Watch as he yells his way to an Oscar nomination

And watch as the guy who stole Best Actor
stops by to pound his chest

Rejoice at the triumphant return of fat f*cking
Jonah Hill

and recoil at the triumphant debut of his
fat f*cking penis.

Thrill as he tries to shed his image as the
funny fat guy in comedies... by becoming the
funny fat guy in a Scorsese movie.

Experience the film that critics f*cking slammed
for glorifying the lifestyle of a corrupt

Even though he’s a f*cking miserable wife
beating drug addict who loses his business,

They do make qualludes look f*cking awesome,
though!

Witness Scorcese break out every Scorcese-ism
in the book, like

"See that humongous estate down there? That's
my house."
having a huge f*cking hard on for

And an ambitious criminal main character with
a short temper whose pride is ultimately their

So settle in for a movie that’s all about
f*cking excess,
"F*ck this, sh*t that, c*ck, c***, a**hole"

To all the people in suits listening to Leo
talk
To shots of those same people going
The director of The Princess Bride
The Artist Formerly Known as Relevant

The real Jordan Belfort,
because that guy deserves a f*ckin break,

which is crazy when you think about all the
other people who have Oscars, like
The Wolf of F*cking Wall Street

It’s the one Dicaprio used in Wolf of Wall
Street.
Be sure to subscribe for more Honest Trailers.

comments.text:
Jonah Hill's character in this made me want to scream. I HATED him with a 
passion. What a fucking asshole in this. He annoyed me more then Lamar in 
GTA5 and I'd hate both of those people in real life. Idiotic selfish 
infuriating assholes.

This was a good movie though. But apparently plenty of people think what he 
did looked like fun. I think he looked miserable through out most of the 
movie. Always worried, always on edge and then suddenly practically 
fainting/spaced out. Too extreme, too depressing.

Everyone in this movie is a grade A asshole. But that is the point.﻿

comments.text:
The scenes in which Leo is tripping fucking balls on quelludes are beyond 
fucking hilarious, especially when he makes himself tumble down the stairs 
to his car, but over all I felt like he was hamming it up, overacting to 
the point of absurdity sometimes. He didn't deserve the Oscar for this 
movie, but for Gilbert Grape I think he most certainly did.
And by the way, f*ck you! Nic Cage might be a little on the crazy side 
these days, but he deserved the Oscar he received.﻿
